glosses: A common soldier of the Turkish army.

examples.text: 2022 December 11, tweet by Ministry of Defense quoted by Anadolu Agencyhttps://www.aa.com.tr/tr/gundem/firat-kalkani-ve-baris-pinari-bolgelerinde-4-pkk-ypgli-terorist-etkisiz-hale-getirildi/2760995
examples.translation: Another blow against terrorists from our soldiers!

etymology:
From Ottoman Turkish محمدجك (Mehmedcik), equivalent to Mehmet + -çik.
Compare Tommy (“British soldier”).
